title:
Are there any current plans for a drive-thru Starbucks in Wilmington? Other smaller cities have them and it would be very convenient.



Also, are there any plans for opening up new Starbucks locations around Wilmington?
text:
Because business plans can change daily, our retail writer Judy Royal
is working on a column to address all new and upcoming business to the
area. The column will appear the last Friday of September in the
column called Retail Details and cover a host of new businesses that
we can find coming to the area. I will let her know to address this
issue as well. Thanks!
